section.section: Each fund is a special continuing, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
Money from the General Fund of the State may not be transferred by budget amendment or otherwise to a fund.
The Treasurer shall separately hold and the Comptroller shall account for each fund.
Each fund is subject to an audit by the Office of Legislative Audits under § 2-1220 of the State Government Article.
Each fund shall be invested and reinvested in the same manner as other State funds.
Any investment earnings are not a part of the fund.
